select.columns:
tflujfin.codflu, tflujfin.nomflu,
SUM(CASE WHEN taptcuen.fecope >= '01-01-2023' AND (MONTH(taptcuen.fecope) <= 12 AND YEAR(taptcuen.fecope) = 2023) THEN impflu ELSE 0 END ) total_año
select.where:
taptcuen.empcode = '125'
AND taptcuen.tipmov IN ('S','R') AND taptcuen.concid IS NOT NULL AND tflujfin.codflu != 'SALINI'

select.columns:
tflujfin.codflu, tflujfin.nomflu, SUM(CASE WHEN crp_tes_qs_calenda.numsem = 1 AND taptcuen.fecope BETWEEN crp_tes_qs_calenda.fecini AND crp_tes_qs_calenda.fecfin THEN impflu ELSE 0 END ) semana_1, SUM(CASE WHEN crp_tes_qs_calenda.numsem = 2 AND taptcuen.fecope BETWEEN crp_tes_qs_calenda.fecini AND crp_tes_qs_calenda.fecfin THEN impflu ELSE 0 END ) semana_2, SUM(CASE WHEN crp_tes_qs_calenda.numsem = 3 AND taptcuen.fecope BETWEEN crp_tes_qs_calenda.fecini AND crp_tes_qs_calenda.fecfin THEN impflu ELSE 0 END ) semana_3, SUM(CASE WHEN crp_tes_qs_calenda.numsem = 4 AND taptcuen.fecope BETWEEN crp_tes_qs_calenda.fecini AND crp_tes_qs_calenda.fecfin THEN impflu ELSE 0 END ) semana_4, SUM(CASE WHEN crp_tes_qs_calenda.numsem = 5 AND taptcuen.fecope BETWEEN crp_tes_qs_calenda.fecini AND crp_tes_qs_calenda.fecfin THEN impflu ELSE 0 END ) semana_5, SUM(CASE WHEN taptcuen.fecope BETWEEN crp_tes_qs_calenda.fecini AND crp_tes_qs_calenda.fecfin THEN impflu ELSE 0 END ) total_mes,
SUM(acum_anual.total_año) total_año
select.where:
taptcuen.empcode = '125' AND crp_tes_qs_calenda.ejerci = 2023 AND crp_tes_qs_calenda.nummes = 12
AND taptcuen.tipmov IN ('S','R') AND taptcuen.concid IS NOT NULL AND tflujfin.codflu != 'SALINI'

select.columns: 'SALINI', 'Saldo inicial', SUM(CASE WHEN crp_tes_qs_calenda.numsem = 1 AND taptcuen.fecope BETWEEN crp_tes_qs_calenda.fecini AND crp_tes_qs_calenda.fecfin THEN impflu ELSE 0 END ) semana_1, SUM(CASE WHEN crp_tes_qs_calenda.numsem = 2 AND taptcuen.fecope BETWEEN crp_tes_qs_calenda.fecini AND crp_tes_qs_calenda.fecfin THEN impflu ELSE 0 END ) semana_2, SUM(CASE WHEN crp_tes_qs_calenda.numsem = 3 AND taptcuen.fecope BETWEEN crp_tes_qs_calenda.fecini AND crp_tes_qs_calenda.fecfin THEN impflu ELSE 0 END ) semana_3, SUM(CASE WHEN crp_tes_qs_calenda.numsem = 4 AND taptcuen.fecope BETWEEN crp_tes_qs_calenda.fecini AND crp_tes_qs_calenda.fecfin THEN impflu ELSE 0 END ) semana_4, SUM(CASE WHEN crp_tes_qs_calenda.numsem = 5 AND taptcuen.fecope BETWEEN crp_tes_qs_calenda.fecini AND crp_tes_qs_calenda.fecfin THEN impflu ELSE 0 END ) semana_5, SUM(impflu) total_mes, SUM(CASE WHEN taptcuen.fecope BETWEEN '01-01-2023' AND (crp_tes_qs_calenda.fecfin) THEN impflu ELSE 0 END ) total_año
select.where:
taptcuen.empcode = '125' AND crp_tes_qs_calenda.ejerci = 2023 AND crp_tes_qs_calenda.nummes = 12
AND taptcuen.tipmov IN ('S','R') AND taptcuen.concid IS NOT NULL AND tflujfin.codflu != 'SALINI' AND tflujfin.codflu = 'COMM'

select.columns: tflujfin.codflu, tflujfin.nomflu, SUM(CASE WHEN crp_tes_qs_calenda.numsem = 1 AND taptcuen.fecope BETWEEN crp_tes_qs_calenda.fecini AND crp_tes_qs_calenda.fecfin THEN impflu ELSE 0 END ) semana_1, SUM(CASE WHEN crp_tes_qs_calenda.numsem = 2 AND taptcuen.fecope BETWEEN crp_tes_qs_calenda.fecini AND crp_tes_qs_calenda.fecfin THEN impflu ELSE 0 END ) semana_2, SUM(CASE WHEN crp_tes_qs_calenda.numsem = 3 AND taptcuen.fecope BETWEEN crp_tes_qs_calenda.fecini AND crp_tes_qs_calenda.fecfin THEN impflu ELSE 0 END ) semana_3, SUM(CASE WHEN crp_tes_qs_calenda.numsem = 4 AND taptcuen.fecope BETWEEN crp_tes_qs_calenda.fecini AND crp_tes_qs_calenda.fecfin THEN impflu ELSE 0 END ) semana_4, SUM(CASE WHEN crp_tes_qs_calenda.numsem = 5 AND taptcuen.fecope BETWEEN crp_tes_qs_calenda.fecini AND crp_tes_qs_calenda.fecfin THEN impflu ELSE 0 END ) semana_5, SUM(CASE WHEN taptcuen.fecope BETWEEN crp_tes_qs_calenda.fecini AND crp_tes_qs_calenda.fecfin THEN impflu ELSE 0 END ) total_mes, SUM(CASE WHEN taptcuen.fecope BETWEEN '01-01-${ejerci}' AND crp_tes_qs_calenda.fecfin THEN impflu ELSE 0 END) total_año

'SALINI', 'Saldo inicial', SUM(CASE WHEN crp_tes_qs_calenda.numsem = 1 AND taptcuen.fecope BETWEEN crp_tes_qs_calenda.fecini AND crp_tes_qs_calenda.fecfin THEN impflu ELSE 0 END ) semana_1, SUM(CASE WHEN crp_tes_qs_calenda.numsem = 2 AND taptcuen.fecope BETWEEN crp_tes_qs_calenda.fecini AND crp_tes_qs_calenda.fecfin THEN impflu ELSE 0 END ) semana_2, SUM(CASE WHEN crp_tes_qs_calenda.numsem = 3 AND taptcuen.fecope BETWEEN crp_tes_qs_calenda.fecini AND crp_tes_qs_calenda.fecfin THEN impflu ELSE 0 END ) semana_3, SUM(CASE WHEN crp_tes_qs_calenda.numsem = 4 AND taptcuen.fecope BETWEEN crp_tes_qs_calenda.fecini AND crp_tes_qs_calenda.fecfin THEN impflu ELSE 0 END ) semana_4, SUM(CASE WHEN crp_tes_qs_calenda.numsem = 5 AND taptcuen.fecope BETWEEN crp_tes_qs_calenda.fecini AND crp_tes_qs_calenda.fecfin THEN impflu ELSE 0 END ) semana_5, SUM(CASE WHEN taptcuen.fecope BETWEEN crp_tes_qs_calenda.fecini AND crp_tes_qs_calenda.fecfin THEN impflu ELSE 0 END ) total_mes, SUM(CASE WHEN taptcuen.fecope BETWEEN '01-01-${ejerci}' AND (crp_tes_qs_calenda.fecfin) THEN impflu ELSE 0 END ) total_año
